results.title: Metformin limits cerebral cavernous malformation development by targeting KLF4-mediated mitochondrial damage.
results.text_hl: Moreover, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ significantly improved @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Dystrophy_Congenital_Megaconial_Type</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566527 @@@mitochondrial structural anomalies and@@@ dysfunction associated with @DISEASE_Immunologic_Deficiency_Syndromes @DISEASE_MESH:D007153 @@@PDCD10 deficiency@@@, characterized by the presence of mitochondrial puncta and the loss of cristae, followed by impaired mitochondrial membrane potential and increased mitoROS in endothelial cells with the mutation.

citations.NLM: Yan C, Ye Y, Liu N, Zhang D, Du W, Li Y, Li G, Li C, Li J, Ma S, Dai Z, Xiong Z, Wang Y, Men C, Bi R, Duan Q, Xu W, Husilengtu, Cao Y, Du J, Shi C. Metformin limits cerebral cavernous malformation development by targeting KLF4-mediated mitochondrial damage. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 2025 Jun 24;777():152241. PMID: 40570636

results.title: Metformin Prevents Cisplatin-Induced Cognitive Impairment and Brain Damage in Mice
results.text_hl: Co-administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ prevented all of these @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Dystrophy_Congenital_Megaconial_Type</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566527 @@@structural abnormalities@@@ in cisplatin-treated @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Zhou W, Kavelaars A, Heijnen CJ. Metformin Prevents Cisplatin-Induced Cognitive Impairment and Brain Damage in Mice PLoS One. 2016;11(3):e0151890. PMID: 27018597
